mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT RES.PROC_INST_ID_ as id, s.NAME_ AS subject, p.NAME_ as definitionName, RES.START_USER_ID_ AS startUserId, RES.SUSPENSION_STATE_ as suspensionState FROM ACT_RU_EXECUTION RES INNER JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF P ON RES.PROC_DEF_ID_ = P.ID_ LEFT JOIN act_hi_procinst s ON RES.PROC_INST_ID_ = s.PROC_INST_ID_ WHERE RES.PARENT_ID_ IS NULL ORDER BY RES.START_TIME_ desc

SELECT DISTINCT RES.ID_ AS id, p.NAME_ AS subject, RES.START_USER_ID_ AS startUserId, RES.START_TIME_ AS startTime, RES.END_TIME_ AS endTime, DEF.NAME_ AS definitionName FROM ACT_HI_PROCINST RES LEFT OUTER JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF DEF ON RES.PROC_DEF_ID_ = DEF.ID_ LEFT JOIN act_hi_procinst p ON RES.PROC_INST_ID_ = p.PROC_INST_ID_ WHERE RES.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL ORDER BY RES.END_TIME_ desc
SELECT s.ID_ as id, s.PROC_INST_ID_ as processId, s.NAME_ as nodeName, s.ASSIGNEE_ as assignee FROM act_ru_task s WHERE s.PROC_INST_ID_=#{processId} and s.EXECUTION_ID_ IS not NULL
